As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time data or current news. However, according to the latest available information, the level of public investment in infrastructure in Longford is moderate, with ongoing projects in road, water, and wastewater systems.

Some of the projects currently underway in Longford include the N55 Realignment Project, the Longford Southern Ring Road Project, the Longford Flood Alleviation Scheme, and the upgrade of the Granard Water Treatment Plant. Additionally, Longford County Council has also announced plans to improve local roads, footpaths, and public lighting across the county.
